settings.DIRECT_MODE_ON_DESCRIPTION: Deactivate the "Direct Mode" to select a shuttle by yourself.
settings.DIRECT_MODE_OFF_DESCRIPTION: Activate the "Direct Mode", if the app should select a shuttle for you.
settings.FAVORITES_DESCRIPTION_1: Favorized shuttles will be called first.
settings.FAVORITES_DESCRIPTION_2: Favorized shuttles will be displayed on top.
settings.BLACKLIST_DESCRIPTION_1: Shuttles in your blacklist won't be called anymore.
settings.BLACKLIST_DESCRIPTION_2: Shuttles in your blacklist won't be displayed anymore.

msg.ALREADY_ADDED_IN_BLACKLIST_TITLE: This shuttle is in your blacklist
msg.ALREADY_ADDED_IN_BLACKLIST_SUBTITLE: Remove it from your blacklist, to add it to your favorites.
msg.ALREADY_ADDED_IN_FAVORITES_SUBTITLE: Remove it from your favorites, to add it to your blacklist.
